name: D&D 5E - PaladinAura
description:
A Roll20 API that auto-applies Paladin Auras and shows which characters are affected by the aura through the use of token-markers. Only Compatible with the **D&D 5E by Roll20** character sheet.

* Forum Thread
* [Readme & further instructions](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/tree/master/PaladinAura)
authors: Layton Burchell. User "Oosh" https://app.roll20.net/users/4775411/oosh. Special thanks to: Gustav Merelius.

useroptions.name: DiagonalMeasurementMethod
useroptions.description: Changes how distances are calculated between tokens. "auto" will match the settings of the page.
